thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Jane

author: Jane
title: Jane
text: I've travelled with Intrepid a number of times to different countries including Turkey, Mexico, Cuba and Italy. Each time I've had a great experience, had the benefit of informed leaders, travelled with good company and got the most out of my visit. I really like their balance between organised activity and time to do your own thing. Intrepid look after all the logistics and leave you to have a fun time.
